sep_scene.content: In this image, we see a scene from the movie "Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows". The main focus is on actor Rupert Grint, who is standing in front of a fireplace. He is wearing a black suit and holding a piece of paper in his hand. His face is lit up with a smile, and he is looking directly at the camera. The background is dark, with a curtain and a window visible. The overall atmosphere of the scene is warm and cozy, with the fire in the fireplace adding to the ambiance.

In this image, we see a scene from the movie "Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows". The main focus is on the character Ron Weasley, portrayed by actor Rupert Grint. He is standing in a room with a red curtain and a bed in the background. Ron Weasley is wearing a striped shirt and has a green scarf wrapped around his neck. His face is lit up with a smile, and he is looking at the camera with a concerned expression. In the background, there are two other people, one of whom is wearing a green and white striped shirt.
